overview: Mia is a girl who is so obses with hip hop dance. But it is quite impossible for him to realize his dream. But all that changed when Remi presence in his life. Remi is a dancer who is quite talented and charming succeeding Mia attention. They both accompanied with Dafi and Robby who also Mahu realize their dreams along with accompanying dance game across the country.
title: Sayang You Can Dance
